name: Intelligus Community Edition
short_description:
Enterprises that embed social functionality and real time collaboration empower their employees with a quicker and a more efficient way to working; the bottom line, productivity and profitability.

For the most dynamic and feature rich open source social business platform look no further. Intelligus is an advanced Social Business Software Suite that helps employees collaborate and interact with customers, partners and colleagues to rapidly solve the business challenges of today.
